sentences.en: A CD-I deck looks like a video recorder and plugs into the home television and stereo system.
sentences.cn: CD-I规格的光碟播放器看起来就像录像机，能与家庭电视和立体音响系统相连。
扬声器音质好的立体声音响

sentences.en: Cool summer dance sounds are drifting from the stereo indoors.
sentences.cn: 清凉的夏日舞曲的声音从室内音响中传了出来。

sentences.en: For a good stereo effect, the speakers should not be too wide apart.
sentences.cn: 为了达到理想的立体声效果，扬声器之间的距离不能太远。

sentences.en: He always plays his stereo with the bass turned right up.
sentences.cn: 他放立体声音响时总把低音调得很大。

sentences.en: He was listening to the Beatles on the car stereo.
sentences.cn: 他在听汽车立体声音响播放的披头士乐队的歌。

sentences.en: Is this as loud as the stereo will go?
sentences.cn: 这是音响所能开的最大音量 吗 ?

sentences.en: It is more expensive to run a personal stereo on disposable batteries than on rechargeables.
sentences.cn: 随身听使用一次性电池比用充电电池更贵。

sentences.en: She had the stereo on at full blast.
sentences.cn: 她把立体声音响开到了最大音量.

sentences.en: Television sets and stereo sound sets are now in great demand.
sentences.cn: 电视机和立体声音响设备现在的需要量很大.

sentences.en: The concert will be broadcast in stereo.
sentences.cn: 音乐会将用立体声播放。

sentences.en: The personal stereo has a water-resistant outer case.
sentences.cn: 这款随身听的外壳是防水的。

sentences.en: The stereo is near the door.
There is a stereo in the room.
sentences.cn: 客厅里有台立体声音响.

sentences.en: This is FM stereo one oh three point seven.
This is no time to lash out on a new stereo.
sentences.cn: 现在不是奢侈花钱买新立体音响的时候.

sentences.en: to turn up the treble on the stereo
sentences.cn: 把立体声唱机的高音音量调大

words.tran_cn: 立体的；体视镜的；有立体感的
用铅版印刷的；老一套的
[测] 体视学；体视术；体视法；立体观视；实体镜学
把…浇铸成铅版；使成为陈规（stereotype的过去分词）
[声]立体的；立体声的；立体感觉的
[声]立体声；立体声系统；[印刷]铅版；立体照片

trans.tran_en: using a recording or broadcasting system in which the sound is directed through two speakers

trans.tran_cn: 立体声，立体声系统，铅板，立体系统或立体像片
trans.tran_en: a way of recording or playing sound so that it is separated into two signals and produces more natural sound
